input_email_body:
Subject: Unapproved Access Medical

An unapproved access attempt to medical data has been detected within the hospital system You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. This may have occurred due to insufficient security protocols or a phishing attack My name is Elena Ivanova.. Immediate system review and temporary access restrictions have been applied. If concerns persist, there may be ongoing vulnerabilities and potential data breaches.
